Interrogator: What was the condition of the man who entered the cab?
Interrogee: The customer who entered the care was seemingly very tired and frustrated. It was as if he has a long day and he was coming from some corporate job or something and he was really tired and frustrated

Interrogator: How did the driver reciprocate on asking for a ride.
Interrogee: The driver said that he's done for the day. And he's not taking anymore rides, he's going home. Still the customer insisted that do not refuse just take him then the driver accepted.

Passenger was a senior consultant at asian corporation limited and he just found out that his wife had an affair with neighbour and he also has a daughter and was worried about daughter's future and how he should react to the wife's affair, he was frustrated with his life.

Interrogator: After hearing the passenger story how did the driver respond?
Interrogee: After hearing the passenger story the driver , earlier the passenger said that he want to go marine drive then the driver took him to some random under construction bridge that was not complete, to the edge of it and he started telling his story that how he came to Mumbai then took all kinds of job to make a survival then he fall in love with a girl and then the girl also was caught in affair with his neighbor. And earlier the girl forced him to not live with his parents. And despite of all this, he stayed with that girl and the girl cheated him. So, he was comparing his situation with the customer.

Interrogator: Why driver took him to the remote place
Interrogee: The customer was confused between deciding whether he should do suicide or if you should kill his wife. Then the driver reveals that he was also planning to kill his wife he has his wife as hostage in his car trunk and he was going to some random railway track to die. But then since the customer came in he also want to die so they took him to a bridge and then he jump with the car.

Interrogator: Okay, what was the driver story about.
Interrogee: The driver story was that he came to Mumbai to earn his living. He was doing all kinds of jobs. Then he fell in love with a girl and married her. Then he started driving cab after some time. He has only one demand from his wife that he wants to live in a joint family with his parents. But the girl refused. She said that she want a separate house. And after that the man since he loved him he agreed to her demand and they start living separate. All his relative said that she is not good for you and you should leave but he still with his wife since he was in love with her Then, then later he found out that his wife was having an affair with his neighbor. And then he kidnapped her and she was in his car trunk andhe was going to die with her.

Interrogator: Who was in the deck of the car. And what she was doing there?
Interrogee: She was kept as a hostage and the driver think that if they can't live together happily , they will die together.

Interrogator: Where was the taxi parked in the end and what was the intention of the driver?
Interrogee: At the end taxi was parked at the edge of under construction bridge. And earlier, the taxi driver has decided that he was going to railroad tracks so that he can die in a car accident from a train but when the customer came, he decided that since the customer has similar story, he will die along with him.
